EmailTemplate.name: CMN Change- Reminder
EmailTemplate.subject: Reminder: Important Change To Your Support Email
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Reminder: CallMeNow is changing
In follow up to our recent email, we wanted to remind you that the general address CallMeNow@ipreo.com is being retired. Given the continued growth of our business we want to ensure that you always have quick access to our IR-focused Account Management team. Moving forward you can access your 24/7/365 support team at:
CallMeNowIR@ipreo.com
Thank you,
Ipreo Account Management
+1.800.305.0819 or +1.212.849.5424 (US); +44.20.7665.9822 (EMEA); +852.5808.2616 (Asia Pacific); +81.3.5207.2912 (Japan)
Please feel free to reach out to us if you have any questions
